  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.polidea.rxandroidble.RxBleConnection.Connector
    com.polidea.rxandroidble.RxBleRadioOperationCustom
    use RxBleCustomOperation
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.polidea.rxandroidble.internal.util.UUIDUtil
    use AdvertisedServiceUUIDExtractor instead. This class may change in later releases.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    com.polidea.rxandroidble.exceptions.BleCannotSetCharacteristicNotificationException.UNKNOWN
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.polidea.rxandroidble.RxBleDevice.establishConnection(Context, boolean)
    com.polidea.rxandroidble.RxBleClient.scanBleDevices(UUID...)
    use RxBleClient.scanBleDevices(ScanSettings, ScanFilter...) instead
    com.polidea.rxandroidble.internal.connection.RxBleConnectionImpl.writeCharacteristic(BluetoothGattCharacteristic)
    com.polidea.rxandroidble.RxBleConnection.writeCharacteristic(BluetoothGattCharacteristic)
    Use RxBleConnection.writeCharacteristic(BluetoothGattCharacteristic, byte[]) instead
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    com.polidea.rxandroidble.exceptions.BleCannotSetCharacteristicNotificationException(BluetoothGattCharacteristic)
    com.polidea.rxandroidble.exceptions.BleDisconnectedException()
    In general, there's no place in a public API that requires you to instantiate this exception directly. If you use it anyway, please switch to BleDisconnectedException.BleDisconnectedException(String, int)
    com.polidea.rxandroidble.exceptions.BleDisconnectedException(String)
    In general, there's no place in a public API that requires you to instantiate this exception directly. If you use it anyway, please switch to BleDisconnectedException.BleDisconnectedException(String, int) or don't use it.
    com.polidea.rxandroidble.exceptions.BleDisconnectedException(Throwable, String)
    In general, there's no place in a public API that requires you to instantiate this exception directly. If you use it anyway, please switch to BleDisconnectedException.BleDisconnectedException(Throwable, String, int)
    com.polidea.rxandroidble.exceptions.BleGattCannotStartException(BleGattOperationType)
    com.polidea.rxandroidble.exceptions.BleGattException(int, BleGattOperationType)
